title: Lake Houston/ Kingwood New Community Premium Amenities
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
Welcome to Kingwood area’s new pet-friendly apartments near Houston.

Our community offers spacious one, two, and three-bedroom floor plans featuring private gated patios or balconies, oversized tubs and standing tile showers, walk-in closets, designer kitchens, and optional attached garages.
Live each day better than the last with a 24-hour fitness center, miles of trails, on-site pet park, and resort-style pool overlooking a 10-acre nature reserve.
Discover brand new designer spaces and the best in amenities at a community perfect for nature lovers and urban adventurers alike.
OUTDOOR DINING WITH GRILLING & FIRE PITS
RECREATION ROOM WITH VINTAGE ARCADE; POOL TABLE
RESIDENT LOUNGE & BUSINESS CENTER WITH STARBUCKS COFFEE BAR
CLOSE TO VALLEY RANCH TOWN CENTER
